# antd 5.0以上版本，switch组件点击出现黑框

`🤔 Need Reproduce`

### Reproduction link

[https://ant.design/components/switch-cn](https://ant.design/components/switch-cn)

### Steps to reproduce

点击switch按钮

### What is expected?

不出现黑边框

### What is actually happening?

实际出现了黑边框

| Environment | Info         |
| ----------- | ------------ |
| antd        | 5.6.1        |
| React       | 18           |
| System      | win10        |
| Browser     | 89.0.4389.90 |
